name: Roll a Ball (Turtle Games Hannover)
description:
Hey,

it is a little roll a ball game. Where you have to collect x number of coins to "open" the finish. It was a fun project with an friend. 

At the moment it only has one level with easy to none difficulty. 

We had many ideas but abandoned the project. 

if you want the Source (Unity 2017.1) contact  me i will share it with pleasure.

if you want to give a tip feel free.
